title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Library Information Utilization Microlearning for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can utilize search interfaces of three specialized science databases via 5-minute mobile tutorials
Learners can apply credibility evaluation criteria for academic materials (author affiliation, publication year, references) with 80% accuracy in scenario-based activities
Learners can navigate open-access resources provided by libraries in mobile environments and collect at least three job-related materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
